simulate peptide level data with two groups

Source: R/simulate_LFQ_data.R
sim_lfq_data.Rd

simulate peptide level data with two groups

sim_lfq_data(
  Nprot = 20,
  N = 4,
  fc = list(A = c(D = -2, U = 2, N = 0), B = c(D = 1, U = -4)),
  prop = list(A = c(D = 10, U = 10), B = c(D = 5, U = 20)),
  mean_prot = 20,
  sd = 1.2,
  probability_of_success = 0.3
)

Arguments

Nprot

number of porteins

N

group size

fc

D - down regulation N - matrix, U - regulation

prop

proportion of down (D), up (U) and not regulated (N)

Examples

res <- sim_lfq_data()
sim_lfq_data(Nprot = 10)
#> # A tibble: 216 × 11
#>    proteinID average_prot_abundance    sd peptideID sample  group  mean     N
#>    <chr>                      <dbl> <dbl> <chr>     <chr>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl>

dd <- sim_lfq_data()
dd$abundance <- add_missing(dd$abundance)

sim_lfq_data_config()
